news_header: The LA County district attorney has recommended parole for the Menendez brothers, convicted of murdering their parents in 1989, due to new evidence.
news_text: Erik and Lyle Menendez, who were sentenced to life in prison for the 1989 murder of their parents, may soon be eligible for parole after LA County district attorney George Gascón announced a review of their sentences based on newly uncovered evidence. This development has sparked significant debate across America. Meanwhile, Hurricane Milton has caused widespread destruction in Florida, with tornadoes and floods leading to fatalities and extensive damage to homes.
